items.title: Ubisoft cancels Prince of Persia remake as part of major reorganization
items.summary: Ubisoft is announcing a major reorganization, and with the changes, it's refocusing its portfolio and canceling some games, including the beleaguered remake of Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time. With the reorganization, Ubisoft will focus its efforts on big open worlds and live service games and â€¦
